JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Web Design Intern at The 0-Mission (unpaid temporary position)
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you passionate about web design and digital user experiences? Do you thrive on creating beautiful and functional designs while helping businesses contribute to the green transition? Then you might be our next intern!

Who Are We?

The 0-Mission is a B2B marketplace for renewable energy. We offer a subscription solution that makes it easy for companies to support the development of more green energy.

About the Position

We’re looking for an intern to help us migrate our website from WordPress to Webflow. If you have a keen interest in web design and a knack for digital creativity, we want to hear from you! You’ll work closely with our team and gain hands-on experience in everything from the design process to implementation.

Your Main Tasks Will Include:
  • Designing and developing our website in Webflow.
  • Ensuring a seamless and streamlined user experience.
  • Contributing creative solutions and digital concepts that strengthen our message.
  • Optimizing the visual appeal of the website based on modern design principles.
Who Are You?

We imagine you are:

  • A student in multimedia design, digital concept development, design, or a related field - or looking for an internship related to a job-training program
  • Experienced or interested in working with Webflow.
  • Familiar with Figma or similar design tools.
  • Passionate about web design, user experience, and digital solutions.
  • Comfortable with the technical aspects of website setup.

Most importantly, we value team players who take responsibility, thrive in a flat organizational structure, and appreciate the dynamic nature of a startup environment.

What We Offer

At The 0-Mission, you’ll play a key role in building innovative solutions and leaving a significant positive impact. You’ll be part of a motivated team based at BloxHub in Copenhagen. We will make sure to connect you to other startups and introduce you to the eco-system - and after completing. your internship you will have a lot to show for future employers. The position is temporary (at least 4 weeks) and we will adjust the period to match your studies/jobtraining program. 

Interested?

Send us your application and let us know how you can contribute to our mission!

If you share our excitement for our work, please email your application to Patrick Rasmussen at patrick@the0mission.dk as soon as possible. You’re also welcome to call us at +45 22 77 34 39 for more information.

We look forward to hearing from you  -in the mean time visit us at www.the0mission.dk
